channel.title: Connection error 5 4 3 2 1
channel.description:
So i'm a noobie and i want to try coding a little bit, i got some experience but not many ;p.
So, this is my problem:
I found an awesome server at the 'server downloads' section, and i downloaded it all, but now i have 1 problem: i changed the ip to 127.0.0.1 and now when i run it, it says 'connection error 5, 4, 3, 2, 1' etc.. please help me :3!
(http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547401.0.html) link of the server
I'd be the happiest guy in the world if someone could help me now :

item.title: Connection error 5 4 3 2 1
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy

Whatever you change redo it and run the server vistex v2 is already set on localhost.
